title: Tucked away down a lovely long driveway you will find one of Chestnut
description: Tucked away down a lovely long driveway you will find one of Chestnut Hill’s most charming gems. The original carriage house, built in 1890, is beautifully sited on .25 acres. Upstairs 2BR/2BA nicely set up with ample closet space and fabulous bookcases. Looking for the utmost privacy just a short walk to Chestnut Hill shops, restaurants, Spas, salons, schools, transportation, trails and world class fitness and sporting options? This one is made for you.

description:

title: Northern Liberties 1 Bed Condo with Parking and Balcony
description:
Dynamite 1 bedroom condo with PARKING in the desirable 950 Mode building in the heart of Northern Liberties and all the hotspots! Located on the 2nd floor, you'll find this spacious unit which faces the rear garden area of the building so you don't hear any street noise.
The large foyer leads into the spacious living and dining area features stunning bamboo floors that flow throughout and an oversized sliding glass door leading out to the relaxing, private balcony. The kitchen features a granite countertops, a breakfast bar, ample modern cabinetry and stainless steel appliances.
The open layout is ideal for everyday living as well as entertaining friends. The bathroom is spacious featuring modern tile and fixtures. In the bedroom you'll find another wall-of-windows for fabulous light and a large walk-in closet with a custom Container Store organization system.
The condo comes with one deeded parking spot in the secured lot and offers an electric charger for your car! The association also provides a bike shed, a shared patio lounge area with barbeque and seating and has a secure FOB-accessed lobby. And to top it off, this building is located directly across the street from Liberty Lands Park.
Truly the perfect Northern Liberties location with access to public transportation and excellent walkability to Liberties Walk, Acme, and all the restaurants, bars & shoppes. Just unpack & enjoy!
Listing provided by Keller Williams Real Estate

title: Graduate Hospital 3 Bed 2.5 Bath with Roof Deck and Finished Basement
description:
This stunning rehabbed 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home located in Graduate Hospital offers a private ground level patio, third floor balcony, and spacious roofdeck!
Upon arrival you will enter into the open floorplan living area with pristine hardwood flooring and recessed lighting throughout. To the rear of the home, off of the living room is a half bath and kitchen. The kitchen is fully equipped with stainless steel appliances, plenty of cabinetry for storage and access to the private fenced outdoor patio.
Up the stairs are two spacious bedrooms with hardwood flooring, tons of closet space and one full bathroom with shower tub. The third floor features the primary bedroom with full walk in closet that leads directly into the primary bathroom that is fully tiled with double sink vanity and stand-in shower.
Down the hall you will find a sliding glass door giving access to a spacious balcony overlooking Kimball Street and a staircase leading up to the rooftop with stunning Center City skyline views. Do not forget about the fully finished basement that would be perfect for another bedroom, workout area or home office!
No Pets Allowed
Listing courtesy of Keller Williams Philly

title: The brand new 3BD/2.5BTH House for rent
description: Need to get out of Philadelphia but want to live very close to the city with easy access? Incredible amenities in suburb right outside of Philadelphia, including one of top school districts in the state: Colonial School District. Convenience of a few minutes walk to the Plymouth Whitmarsh High School, Colonial Elementary School, the Whitmarsh Elementary school and the William Jeanne's library and learning center and the brand new colonial middle school is a short distance located off of Plymouth Road in Plymouth Meeting. Located within minutes of a bike/running path that encircles the mega sports complex of VICTORY FIELDS. The private back yard backs DIRECTLY up to MILES PARK open space area of the fields. The attractive looking colonial house sits in a fabulous neighborhood that is neighbor friendly, family friendly, yet superb access to philadelphia's great surrounding suburbs that enjoy great night life, top foodie areas, restaurants, pubs, historic areas, etc. such as Conshohocken, Ambler, Fort Washington, Plymouth Meeting, Blue Bell, Collegeville, Oaks, Gwynedd, Valley Forge, Main Line, Lower Merion, King of Prussia, Norristown, East Norriton, Bridgeport, and of course minutes drive to CHESTNUT HILL, Mount Airy, Manayunk, Fairmount, Art Museum Area, Center City Philadelphia. In the past we have rented to families, couples, and Single people alike. Nearby hospitals- Bryn Mawr, Penn Presbyterian, CHOP, Pennsylvania Hospital, Chestnut Hill hospital. Our location has Septa Regional Rails (formerly known as R5) in several locations within minutes of our house including Conshohocken, Spring Mill Station, Chestnut Hill East and Chestnut Hill West, Miquon, Ambler Rail Station, Ivy Ridge Station, etc... These trains are a quick trip to Philadelphia, 30th street station, all suburban lines, etc... There is also a Septa Bus Route nearby. Just minutes to routes 76, 676, PA Turnpike (I-276) , I- 476 (blue route), 309, 422. The location also provides close proximity to numerous beautiful parks, playgrounds, library, bike trails. You can bike ride to the rail to trail bike trail access which is all along the river (SRT) with one end into Philadelphia Boat house Row and Art Museum to all the way through Valley Forge and the Perkiomen trail. It is beautiful. You can also ride to the Wissahickon Park (Valley Green) and access Biking trails into Philly or hike the trails. Convenient to many area hospitals Abington Hospital, Children's Hospital of Philadelphia, Lankannau Hospital, Chestnut Hill Hospital, Jefferson University Hospital, Hannehman Hospital, Roxborough Memorial Hospital. Close to many great schools: Springside Chestnut Hill Academy, Lasalle College High School, Germantown Academy, Mount Saint Joseph Academy, Chestnut Hill College, Villanova, St. Joe's University, Haverford College, Cabrini College, Ursinus College, Arcadia College Rosemont College, etc... The house has 3 Bedrooms, One Full Bathroom, TWO HALF Bathrooms. Hardwood Flooring throughout. First Floor has living room, dining room, (Fireplace that currently is used as decorative), kitchen, Family room/Den overlooking backyard and MILES PARK, Half Bathroom. First Floor has Breezeway connected to side of house where garage is connected. Basement is Unfinished with separation of utility area. Full Washer and Dryer located on utility side of basement and plenty of room for storage. Unfinished room with walk out exit to back yard. Second story has Three Bedrooms, one FULL HALL BATHROOM, One HALF BATHROOM CONNECTED TO ONE OF THE BEDROOMS. Three bedroom closets. Hardwood flooring. CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONING THROUGHOUT. GAS HEAT. ONE CAR GARAGE. BACKS UP TO PRIVATE AREA OF MILES PARK. BEAUTIFUL SETTING. Great neighborhood. Pets Might be acceptable with pet deposit, etc. each case is individually discussed.

title: All Utilities Included Large Studio at 43rd Pine St
description:
*Important: I'm no longer local to Philly and the current tenant will help with showings. I may not respond promptly if you simply hit reply without any details. Thanks for your understanding!

Having lived in Philly for 3 years, my tenant is moving back to NYC for medical school. This is a large studio with bay window, fireplace (might work but do not recommend using it fully), Ikea kitchenette including gas cooktop, built-in microwave, countertop electric convection oven, laminate flooring, large closet, high ceiling! ALL utilities are included in the rent: cold/hot water, heat, cooking gas, electricity, wi-fi AND laundry privilege to a large washer/dryer set on the first floor. A window AC unit is also provided.

Tenant is not planning to move most of his furniture with him. If you're interested in any of it (for a small fee or free), please ask him on your visit.
Photos were from previous tenants and the current condition shows additional wear and tear. I made a quick stop on 4/3 and noticed the following issues. (1) paint on some kitchen cabinet fronts are chipping away. I'll be researching on how to repair them since Ikea has changed its product design and they cannot be replaced with doors from the new line. (2) tenant didn't install AC properly two years ago and it caused some water damage on the wall below a window. Some paint work may be needed there. (3) tenant broke the medicine cabinet glass door - looking to see how it can be replaced with a close matched door. Prefer not to replace the whole cabinet because it's a large one.

Immediate proximity to all that Center City and Fitler Square has to offer including world-class shopping and dining, local parks and Schuylkill Trail, Trader Joe’s and quick access to all transportation options.

title: Rare opportunity to own a Fitler Square condo with private outdoor
description: Rare opportunity to own a Fitler Square condo with private outdoor space! This one-of-a-kind 2 bed, 2 bath bi-level home is the perfect fit if you're looking for great space in a phenomenal location. Enter the unit into a spacious entryway with a large coat closet and a full-size pantry that lead to an updated kitchen overlooking the open concept living and dining room. The modern open kitchen has plenty of counter and storage space as well as a new refrigerator and a lovely window that brings in great light. A few steps down takes you into the spacious living and dining area with extra tall ceilings, wood-burning fireplace, and custom built-in home office area. Two large east-facing windows complete this room. Walk up the stairs to the second floor and you will find two good-sized bedrooms. The first of the bedrooms is perfect for a home office, guest room, or nursery and has its own full bath right outside in the hall. Down the hall, you will find the master bedroom with an en suite bath, a full wall of closets with storage all the way up to the extra tall ceilings, as well as more custom built-ins. The large windows allow for great light and views from this room as well. New stackable washer /dryers are in a convenient laundry closet on this floor as well. Open the door to the spacious roof deck with some of the best 360-degree views around including the dramatic city skyline. This private outdoor living area has plenty of room for entertaining and enjoying a peaceful dinner or morning coffee. Other great features of this condo include new windows throughout, newer air conditioning, hardwood flooring throughout, and a low quarterly condo fee. Proximity to the Schuylkill River Path, dog park, the Markward Playground (basketball and tennis courts), 30th Street Station, Penn and Drexel campuses, Rittenhouse Sq park, Fitler Sq Park, weekend farmers markets, some of the best restaurants and coffee shops, the new Goddard School and so much more!

affordable 1 bed 1 bath Condo in an upscale LUXURY HIGH RISE BUILDING with 24 hour Concierge / Security and VERY LOW CONDO FEES in the centrally located and sought after neighborhood of Washington Square West in downtown Philadelphia. The historic Western Union Building featuring Beaux Arts style of the time, was originally built 100 years ago as the headquarters of Western Union Telegraph Company, and was beautifully and tastefully expanded and redesigned  into a luxury 12- story boutique residence by Philadelphia's renowned architect Cecile Baker in 2008. The unit itself: Nestled on the 5th floor (enabling you to take the steps OR the elevator which many people like), this very quiet spot faces the courtyard, giving it an air of peace and tranquility. Upon entering, you will note the quaint foyer, which acts as a buffer to the main living area on one side and the bedroom and bath on the other (which isn't alway the case with these size condos) . You will fall for its souring ceilings and  large windows (which make the unit feel more spacious), open floor plan, modern kitchen and solid hardwood flooring! The bedroom is plenty big for a king, and boasts a large walk in closet. There is a coat closet and an in unit Washer/Dryer included in the sale. A perfect first time purchase, downsize purchase, or pied de terre for someone looking for the convenience, luxury, security and peace of mind of a full service Center City building where PARKING IS AVAILABLE ON SITE for an extra monthly fee. The low condo fee includes water, sewer, gas cooking, a fitness center, and a courtyard  with a private secure dog run. One of the great things about Wash West is its central location: less than 7 blocks in any direction to most of the great neighborhoods , historic squares and parks of Philadelphia: walkable to beautiful Washington Square and Rittenhouse Square, to the vibrant arts district on Broad St, to Restaurant Row; an easy walk to the center city business district and neighborhoods like Old City, Bella Vista, Queen Village and the Italian Market, all offering award winning dining, shopping and nightlife - and very close to public transportation and Jefferson Hospital!
